name: POS Sales Reconciliation
query:
select
a.name AS `Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice`,
a.owner AS `Sales Person:Data`, 
a.posting_date As `Invoice Date:Date:200`, 
a.paid_amount AS `Total Paid Amt:Currency:80`			
from `tabSales Invoice` a
where
a.docstatus !=2 
and a.is_pos =1
and a.posting_date >= %(from_date)s
and a.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
and a.posting_time >= (select start_time from `tabPOS Shift Detail` where shift_name=%(shift)s)
and a.posting_time <= (select end_time from `tabPOS Shift Detail` where shift_name=%(shift)s)
and a.owner = %(owner)s
